lyric:
[00:00.70]You're gonna have to take him away, cause he don't wanna leave
[00:06.16]Charlie's such a good boy, a good boy
[00:10.61]Mamma's crying out, "Where's he hiding?"
[00:15.00]Charlie's such a good boy.
[00:17.74]
[00:18.62]And now he's sleeping at home in his rocket ship bed
[00:23.79]Why does being good feel so damn bad?
[00:27.64]He stares at a picture of his run away dad
[00:31.93]Shines his flashlight steady.
[00:35.15]Kid, you're such an easy target, without a rebel bone.
[00:40.40]You're so compliant, quiet as a stepping stone.
[00:44.72]Did he give you the love you were yearning for?
[00:49.09]Did he give you what you need?
[00:52.82]You're gonna have to take him away, cause he don't wanna leave
[00:57.89]Charlie's such a good boy, a good boy
[01:02.38]Mamma's crying out, "Where's he hiding?"
[01:06.84]Charlie's such a good boy, good boy.
[01:11.00]Have you heard the headlines on Blackberry street
[01:15.33]There lived a kid out there in number 523
[01:19.26]He came home smelling of old shaving cream
[01:23.59]He began to act out.
[01:26.52]He became a little devil, BB gun to the birds
[01:32.66]And he spit out the F! and the S! and D! words
[01:37.21]His mamma asked the priest and the priest replied,
[01:40.90]"He used to be an angel, mam, ya, I don't know why."
[01:45.27]You're gonna have to take him away, cause he don't wanna leave
[01:49.81]Charlie's such a good boy, a good boy
[01:54.23]Mamma's crying out, "Where's he hiding?"
[01:58.69]Charlie's such a good boy.
[02:01.54]
[02:03.18]You can keep a secret right? Right.
[02:07.18]I can trust you with my life? Right.
[02:11.65]I don't get no sleep at night, night.
[02:15.77]You can keep a secret right?
[02:19.61]
[02:20.29]You're gonna have to take him away, cause he don't wanna leave
[02:25.54]Charlie's such a good boy, a good boy
[02:29.85]Mamma's crying out, "Where's he hiding?"
[02:34.45]Charlie's such a good boy, good boy.
[02:38.62]Take him away, cause he don't wanna leave
[02:42.70]Charlie's such a good boy, a good boy
[02:47.23]Mamma's crying out, "Where's he hiding?"
[02:51.61]Charlie's such a good boy, a good boy.
tlyric:
[by:其实是大老粗]
[00:00.70]你要把他带走，因为他并不想离开
[00:06.16]查理是个好孩子
[00:10.61]妈妈大声呼喊，“查理躲到哪儿去了？”
[00:15.00]查理是个好孩子
[00:18.62]现在他回到家，睡在他的小床上
[00:23.79]为什么做个好孩子的感觉是那么糟糕？
[00:27.64]他注视着他那已经离开的父亲的照片
[00:31.93]打开手电筒的强光
[00:35.15]孩子，你是一个容易得手的目标，脑后没有反骨
[00:40.40]你太顺从了，安静得像石头
[00:44.72]他给你想要的关爱了吗？
[00:49.09]他给你需要的东西了吗？
[00:52.82]你要把他带走，因为他并不想离开
[00:57.89]查理是个好孩子
[01:02.38]妈妈大声呼喊，“查理躲到哪儿去了？”
[01:06.84]查理是个好孩子
[01:11.00]你听说过发生在黑莓大街的头条新闻吗
[01:15.33]有个小孩住在523号
[01:19.26]他回到家，带着剃须泡沫的气味
[01:23.59]他开始了行动
[01:26.52]他变成了一个小恶魔，用BB枪打鸟
[01:32.66]他脱口而出那些脏话************
[01:37.21]妈妈问神父怎么回事，神父回答说
[01:40.90]他原先是个小天使，我也不知道是怎么回事
[01:45.27]你要把他带走，因为他并不想离开
[01:49.81]查理是个好孩子
[01:54.23]妈妈大声呼喊，“查理躲到哪儿去了？”
[01:58.69]查理是个好孩子

[02:07.18]（神父）我可以相信你吗？（查理）可以
[02:11.65]（查理）我晚上不能睡觉
